channel.title: Dumb question, how to set a url thing
channel.description: OK, I was wondering how to set a url like [url=http://www.google.com]www.google.com[/url] to look like "click here" or any other thing. Someone please tell me. I know it's a stupid question but I would really like to know how. Thanks to anyone that helps me.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2007, 10:51:25 PM[/size][hr]By the way, I 'google'd' it. But I didn't find anything about it.

item.title: Dumb question, how to set a url thing
item.dc:creator: @iron_man_ftw iron man ftw
item.description:
@iron_man_ftw wrote:

Yes, thanks a lot. I tried something similar:

[www.google.com]click here[/url]

Anyways, can’t thank you enough :).

Read full topic
item.source: Dumb question, how to set a url thing

item.title: Dumb question, how to set a url thing
item.dc:creator: @Schizzo Schizzo
item.description:
@Schizzo wrote:

I can show you better than I can tell you. If you wanted to link someone to Google, but you wanted it to say “Click here”, then it would look like this:

[url=www.google.com]Click here[/url]

It could come out like this: Click here.

Make sense?

Read full topic
item.source: Dumb question, how to set a url thing
